tls:text.tls:srcline: 為是神通妙用？本體如然？」

tls:line.title: 鎮州臨濟慧照禪師語錄 (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Is this a manifestation of supernatural power, or is it just the way things have always been?" (one has make here a contrast between 用 'function' and 體 'essence', so the trans. does not get the point [CA])

sense.def: function (of the mind, etc.)in the BUDDH. context often contrasted to tǐ 體 'substance' (referring to 'relative' truth as opposed to 'absolute' truth)
